Router View.description:
The `<router-view>` component is a functional component that renders the matched component for the given path. Components rendered in `<router-view>` can also contain their own `<router-view>`, which will render components for nested paths.
`<router-view>` Props:
name
type: string
default: "default"
When a `<router-view>` has a name, it will render the component with the corresponding name in the matched route record's components option.

Router link to path with params.description: Router link to path with params

Router link to path with query.description: Router link to path with query

Router link to named route with params.description: Router link to named route with params

Router link to named route with query.description: Router link to named route with query

Router active-class.description:
Configure the active CSS class applied when the link is active.
type: string
default: "router-link-active"

Router with exact match.description:
exact match mode.
type: boolean
default: false

Router exact-active-class.description:
Configure the active CSS class applied when the link is active with `exact` match.
type: string
default: "router-link-exact-active"

Router aria-current-value.description:
Configure the value of aria-current when the link is active with `exact` match.
type: 'page' | 'step' | 'location' | 'date' | 'time'
default: "page"
